products.title: Men Ultralight Down Jacket
products.material_description: Material: Faux Pu Leather,Full Zip Closure,Color: Solid,Spot Clean,4 Front Zipped Pockets, Internal Pockets For Secure Storage
products.product_description: Item with superior quality 100% genuine lambskin leather lambskin leather is the soft, thin, most supple skin. A buttery texture and finely grained. Stretches well and tends to reshape after wearing - has a type of memory. Drapes well, flows, and has good movement - very form fitting. Higher-end leather-wear. Classy and more fashionable look. resolutions.
